data.prayer: Jesus, make the 46,755 people in the state of Kingston who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kingston, Jamaica
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Kingston do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Kingston prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Kingston, Jamaica the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kingston, Jamaica.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Kingston, Jamaica to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kingston to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kingston, Jamaica has a population of 90,600.

We estimate Kingston has 26,953 people who might know Jesus, 46,755 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 16,892 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
